text: Xenorhabdus griffiniae is a bacterium from the genus of Xenorhabdus which has been isolated from the nematode Steinernema hermaphroditum in Indonesia.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen UniProt == References == == Further reading == * * * ==External links== *Type strain of Xenorhabdus griffiniae at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2006
title: Xenorhabdus griffiniae
